messages.Name: day_before
messages.message: Dear [org_name], Your account expires tomorrow. Pay using Paybill: 111222 Account: [acc_no]. Your wallet balance is [org_wallet].

messages.Name: day_after
messages.message: Dear [org_first_name], Your account expired yesterday. Pay using Paybill:111222 Account: [acc_no] .Your wallet balance is [org_wallet].

messages.Name: right_account
messages.message: Hello [org_first_name], Your payment of [trans_amnt] has been received on [today] at [now]. New wallet balance is [org_wallet].

messages.Name: wrong_account
messages.message: INVALID ACCOUNT. [trans_amnt] recieved on [today] at [now]. Send your name and M-Pesa Transaction Id to 0720268519 For rectification.

messages.Name: refferer_msg
messages.message: Hello [client_f_name] you have been credited with [refferer_trans_amount] from [refferer_name] on [today] at [now].Your new wallet balance is [client_wallet]

messages.Name: refferer_msg
messages.message: Hello [client_f_name] we have recieved your payment of [trans_amnt], your minimum payment allowed is [min_amnt]. Wallet balance is [client_wallet]

messages.Name: account_blocked
messages.message: Dear [org_first_name] Your Acc [acc_no] has been renewed untill [exp_date].  Your new wallet Bal is  [org_wallet]. For enquires call 0720268519

messages.Name: account_extended
messages.message: Dear [org_first_name] Your Acc [acc_no] has been extended until [exp_date]. Your new wallet Bal: [org_wallet]. For enquires call 0720268519

messages.Name: account_deactivated
messages.message: Dear [org_first_name] Your Acc [acc_no] has been deactivated. Paybill:111222 Account: [acc_no]. Your wallet Bal: [org_wallet]. For enquires call 0720268519

messages.Name: welcome_message
messages.message: Welcome [org_first_name]. Your Package payment is [package_fees]. Pay via  paybill No. 111222 account no [acc_no]. Your next expiration date is [exp_date].

messages.Name: welcome_client_sms
messages.message: Vipi [client_f_name] karibu Hypbits, utafanya malipo yako ukitumia paybill No. 4061913 na akaunti namba [acc_no]  kwa [sms_rate] kwa kila sms.

messages.Name: rcv_coracc_billsms
messages.message: Vipi [client_name], tumepokea malipo yako ya [trans_amnt] leo: [today] masaa ya [now]. Balance yako mpya ni [sms_balance] SMS.

messages.Name: rcv_incoracc_billsms
messages.message: Tumepokea [trans_amnt], Akaunti namba amabayo umepeana sio sahihi, tafadahli tuma jumbe fupi ukipeana namba yako ya simu na jina yako kwa 0743551250/0720268519

messages.Name: rcv_belowmin_billsms
messages.message: Vipi, [client_f_name], Malipo chini ya elfu moja haikubaliki tafadhali! Malipo ya chini inayo kubalika ni [min_amnt]

messages.Name: msg_reminder_bal
messages.message: Vipi, [client_f_name], SMS zako zimebaki [sms_balance] fanya malipo ukitumia paybill 4061913 kwa akaunti namba hii [acc_no] ili uziongesha kabla ziishe.

messages.Name: account_frozen
messages.message: Dear [client_f_name] Your Acc [acc_no] will be frozen for [days_frozen] untill [unfreeze_date].  Your wallet Bal as of  [today] at [now] is [client_wallet]. For enquires call 0717748569/0720268519.

messages.Name: account_unfrozen
messages.message: Welcome back [client_f_name], Your Acc [acc_no] has been activated successfully after being frozen. Your new wallet Bal is  [client_wallet]. For enquires call 0717748569/0720268519.
